thread.title: Quimby Hightower went above and beyond!!!
thread.title_full: Quimby Hightower went above and beyond!!! - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: L3L3R3
title: Quimby Hightower went above and beyond!!!
text: I recently had the pleasure to stay at the Park Central Hotel. We were planning a surprise trip for a family member and I was lucky enough to work with Quimby. The service and attention to detail provided by Quimby and everyone else at the Park Central hotel was exceptional. I have read other reviews complaining about the team at the hotel and I would disagree 100%. Quimby was a pure joy and a pleasure to work with. I was honestly blown away by the steps he personally took to ensure our trip was amazing. Thank you to Quimby and the Park Central hotel. It was a trip that we will be talking about for years to come!!!
